title: Cobblestone House, Avon, New York
marks: Signature, Title and Date on back, in pencil: [Cobble Stone House Avon N.Y 1
description: brick two story farmhouse beyond wooden fence; dirt drive; lanterns on fence posts on either side of opening in fence on drive; trees and shrubs with light-colored leaves
